answers.answer: Many of your symptoms sound like viral hepatitis. Have you had your liver checked out? I thik you should dark urine should be checked out soon. Be tested for viral hepatitis a b and c right away to make sure that isnt the problem.
You might me dehydrated - you have many symptoms of dehydration.GL
most of your symptoms sound like dehydration. dehydration can be a symptom of an underlying health issue, so you need to see your doctor for an evaluation.

Try equal parts of lime Gatorade w/ water & that will help tobalance electrolytes & get fluids in. Healthy urine is supposedto have a very pale yellow to clear. You need water to flushkidneys & help muscle tissues. Snack on fruit & nuts for somenutrition all day. Maybe peanut butter for protein to balanceinsulin. You can't get better saying you know what you don't do& do nothing abt it. Avoid junk food & maybe drink tea. Considera urine test. Call ofc & maybe ask for a wk-sheet faxed to lab.Sometimes you can just take in 1st mornings sample & drop off atlab.
What about sugar diabetes? Have you been checked for that? You have all the symptons I believe. Get a fasting glucose test.

question: I've been having various symptoms and was wondering if they all tie in together. They include:-thirst, but cannot drink much-cotton mouth-tired and irritable-infrequent urination/reduced urination-dark colored urine-lightheadedness, almost fainting when standing up(really bad headrushes)-rapid heartbeat and breathing at some points-i get hungry, but have no appetiteCould somebody help me and point out whats wrong before it gets worse?
title: various things wrong!! i cant take it anymore!!!
